parameters.query:
SELECT
  `miles_receipts`.`id` AS `id`,
  `miles_receipts`.`receipt_no` AS `receipt_no`,
  `miles_receipts`.`receipt_date` AS `receipt_date`,
  `miles_receipts`.`transaction_id` AS `transaction_id`,
  `miles_receipts`.`amount` AS `amount`,
  `miles_receipts`.`person_id` AS `person_id`,
  `Miles Enrollments - Enrollment`.`course` AS `Miles Enrollments - Enrollment__course`,
  `Miles Net Enquiries - Person`.`ga_client_id` AS `Miles Net Enquiries - Person__ga_client_id`,
  `Miles Net Enquiries - Person`.`ga_session_id` AS `Miles Net Enquiries - Person__ga_session_id`,
  `Miles Net Enquiries - Person`.`ga_session_number` AS `Miles Net Enquiries - Person__ga_session_number`,
  `Miles Enrollments - Enrollment`.`enrollment_date` AS `Miles Enrollments - Enrollment__enrollment_date`,
  `miles_receipts`.`deposit_date` AS `deposit_date`,
  DATE(`miles_receipts`.`created_at`) AS `created_at`
FROM
  `miles_receipts`
LEFT JOIN `miles_net_enquiries` AS `Miles Net Enquiries - Person` 
  ON `miles_receipts`.`person_id` = `Miles Net Enquiries - Person`.`person_id`
LEFT JOIN `miles_enrollments` AS `Miles Enrollments - Enrollment` 
  ON `miles_receipts`.`enrollment_id` = `Miles Enrollments - Enrollment`.`id`
WHERE
  (`miles_receipts`.`transaction_type` = 'Fee Refund' OR `miles_receipts`.`transaction_type` = 'REFUND')
  AND DATE(`miles_receipts`.`updated_at`) = CURDATE()
GROUP BY
  `miles_receipts`.`id`,
  `miles_receipts`.`receipt_no`,
  `miles_receipts`.`receipt_date`,
  `miles_receipts`.`transaction_id`,
  `miles_receipts`.`amount`,
  `miles_receipts`.`person_id`,
  `Miles Enrollments - Enrollment`.`course`,
  `Miles Net Enquiries - Person`.`ga_client_id`,
  `Miles Net Enquiries - Person`.`ga_session_id`,
  `Miles Net Enquiries - Person`.`ga_session_number`,
  `Miles Enrollments - Enrollment`.`enrollment_date`,
  `miles_receipts`.`deposit_date`,
  DATE(`miles_receipts`.`created_at`)
ORDER BY
  `miles_receipts`.`id` ASC,
  `miles_receipts`.`receipt_no` ASC,
  `miles_receipts`.`receipt_date` ASC,
  `miles_receipts`.`transaction_id` ASC,
  `miles_receipts`.`amount` ASC,
  `miles_receipts`.`person_id` ASC,
  `Miles Enrollments - Enrollment`.`course` ASC,
  `Miles Net Enquiries - Person`.`ga_client_id` ASC,
  `Miles Net Enquiries - Person`.`ga_session_id` ASC,
  `Miles Net Enquiries - Person`.`ga_session_number` ASC,
  `Miles Enrollments - Enrollment`.`enrollment_date` ASC,
  `miles_receipts`.`deposit_date` ASC,
  DATE(`miles_receipts`.`created_at`) ASC
LIMIT
  1048575;
